        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Bölény képe</string>
            <string language="en">the picture of a buffalo </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Abbildung eines Büffels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'image d'un buffle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o retrato de um búfalo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'immagine di un bufalo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η εικόνα ενός βούβαλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el cuadro de un búfalo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Bölény képe a spanyol Altamira-barlangból</string>
            <string language="en">the picture of a buffalo from the spanish Altamira-cave</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">barlangrajz,  </string>
            <string language="en">Cave paint,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Abbildung eines Büffels von der spanischen 
Altamira-Höhle</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'image d'un buffle de l'Altamira-caverne 
espagnole</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o retrato de um búfalo da Altamira-caverna 
espanhola</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'immagine di un bufalo dalla Altamira-caverna 
spagnola</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η εικόνα ενός βούβαλου από την ισπανική 
αλταμηρα-σπηλιά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el cuadro de un búfalo de la Altamira-cueva 
española</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhlefarbe,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peinture de caverne,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pintura da caverna,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vernice della caverna,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρώμα σπηλιών,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pintura de la cueva,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
